short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents binging by allowing you to limit the number of Netflix or Disney+ episodes you can watch at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes a Netflix or Disney+ tab after watching a specific number of episodes in order to prevent binging. You can set the number of episodes to watch at a time in the popup. You can toggle whether the extension is enabled with the command Shift+Alt+O.
